org.openmrs.modulus
[Groovy] Class RestfulUploadController

java.lang.Object
  grails.rest.RestfulController
      org.openmrs.modulus.RestfulUploadController

class RestfulUploadController
extends grails.rest.RestfulController

Extends Grails' REST controller functionality with methods to handle file uploads over a REST interface. An domain object with a byte[] attribute named rawFile is required. You will also need to set parseRequest: false on any URL mappings to an upload action.

Parameters:
< - T > a Grails domain object used as the resource of a RestfulUpload instance
See Also:
grails.rest.RestfulController

Constructor Detail

RestfulUploadController

RestfulUploadController(java.lang.Class resource)

 
Method Detail

doUpload

private java.lang.Object doUpload(java.lang.Object instance)
Uploads a file to the repository, from an HTTP POST request. Unlike other API methods, the entire POST body of the request is treated as the file's binary contents. Any other parameters will need to be specified in the URI.

download

java.lang.Object download(java.lang.Integer id)
Downloads the contents of a file to the client.
Parameters:
id - the internal ID of the file

preUpload

private java.lang.Boolean preUpload()
Verifies that the request was not made read-only, and that a Content-Length header was provided.
Returns:
false if either requirement failed, true if both pass. Sends an HTTP 4xx response if false.

uploadNewFile

@grails.transaction.Transactional
java.lang.Object uploadNewFile()
Uploads a file and creates a new instance for it.
See Also:
doUpload(java.lang.Class)

uploadToId

@grails.transaction.Transactional
java.lang.Object uploadToId()
Uploads a file to an existing instance. Replaces and uploaded content previously stored at that ID.
See Also:
doUpload(java.lang.Object)

withInstance

private java.lang.Object withInstance(int id, groovy.lang.Closure c)
Look for the instance with the ID specified. If found, call a closure with it available.
Parameters:
id - the internal ID of the resource instance
c - closure that is called if that instance is found
Returns:
404 response, or a closure call with the instance

withInstance

private java.lang.Object withInstance(groovy.lang.Closure c)
Call withInstance using the ID found in params.id.
